articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Manchester United and Uruguay striker Cavani is in hot water for using the term negrito in a social media post after his match-winning brace against Southampton on Sunday.
articles.content:
Football agencies will organise cultural and diversity training for their foreign clients to try to avoid the type of race controversy that has left Edinson Cavani facing a ban.

articles.title: Latest update on Raul Jimenez | Wolverhampton Wanderers FC - wolves.co.uk
articles.description: Wolves doctor Matt Perry has provided the following update on Raul Jimenez, who is in the early stages of his recovery after a head injury sustained in Sunday’s win at Arsenal.
articles.content:
Doctor Perry said: Following Rauls injury on Sunday, and the subsequent surgery, he has been recovering well in hospital.

articles.title: Carlos Corberan admits positional tweak backfired in Cardiff City humiliation - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: Jonathan Hogg was deployed in a very deep-lying sweeper role behind the two centre-backs whenever the Terriers had the ball but it ended up creating more problems than it solved
articles.content:

articles.author: Rich Jones
articles.title: Diego Maradona's son asks Lionel Messi to give up No.10 shirt at Barcelona and Argentina - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lionel Messi has followed in the footsteps of Diego Maradona as Barcelona and Argentina's No.10 - but the son of the late superstar wants the number retired at his former teams in his honour
articles.content:
Diego Maradonas son has called on Lionel Messi to give up the No.10 shirt as a tribute to his father after his death.
